title: GO SMS Pro Valentine Day Amor
creator: Themes Architect

extendedInfo.description: We present You a entirely new, cute sms theme for Your phone. Made of light pink, violet and nice contrasting white and red. Behind each message box flies a little, sweet cupid, ready to spread love out to the world. Nicely composed on pastel like background with tiny wings, bow and heart shaped arrow - it's the new definition of cuteness.Requirements:This theme requires GO SMS Pro application installed on your phone. You can download it for free from Google Play typing GO SMS Pro in search field.This theme contains:-  as background sweet, pink and rosy wallpaper- changed messages frames, in different pink tones and white, easier to read. Every massage frame has a small cupid with bow and arrows in shape of heartHow to run our theme:1. Download our GO SMS Pro Valentine Day Amor for free2. Open GO SMS Pro application and press MENU button.3. Choose our Valentine Day Amor Theme and click applyHow to change theme appearance:1. Open GO SMS Pro application and press Menu button.2. Choose Settings.3. From settings tab select Advanced tab.4. Press Appearance Settings5. Set any option of our theme. You can set there:- Conversation List appearance- Conversation appearance- Popup window appearance- Text Font- Reset to default settings.Support - âTHEMES ARCHITECTâ:If you need help with our theme please contact with us on email: themesarchitect@gmail.comOur support works only in the English language. Please contact us in this language because we will solve your problem easier.Comments and rating:If you want to help other users find our theme please leave comment and positive rating.Before posting negative opinion please contact us. We can solve your issue in most cases and you will be happy using our theme without problems.Advertising:This free application is ads supported. Ads may show in notification tray and / or your smartphone home screen. Permissions are for ads.Other themes from âTHEMES ARCHITECTâFull list of our themes is available by clicking our developer name on Google Play.Check our other Â GO Launcher EX, GO SMS Pro and GO Locker free themes. Themes are released regularly so you can find something new every time.Compatibility:Our themes has been tested on the most common smartphone-s offered by manufacturers such as: Samsung, HTC, LG, Sony and Motorola. Our themes works with Android 2.2 and later.
